imdb.plot outline: It's a suburban showdown when a banker, a rebel kid and an executive assistant fall into the hands of a Latino street gang. With a down economy, local day-laborers throw in their lot with MS-13, and are forced to take the suburbanites captive while the bank robbery goes down. Events take a twist however, when Senora Flores' hospitality wins the captives sympathy and then things spiral out of control. The gang leader demands that the captives are killed in order to induct the day-laborers into the gang. In this modern day Western, it all comes down to the showdown and the final fight for what America can and will be.
imdb.title: The Pack
plot: When Evan, the bank manager, hires rebel kid Lucas as a lookout to watch his bank, little do they expect a harrowing experience as they are thrust into a battle for what America is on the streets at night.::Jon Crefeld
